info.description: Subscription definitions client provides an interface to create, modify and retrieve azure subscriptions programmatically.
info.title: SubscriptionDefinitionsClient

get.description: Lists all of the available Microsoft.Subscription API operations.

parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2015-06-01
parameters.name: api-version

schema.description: Result of the request to list operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Profile, endpoint, etc.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

get.description: List an Azure subscription definition by subscriptionId.

parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2015-06-01
parameters.name: api-version

200.description: Normal response for a successful query. The response body will contain the data that matches the filters specified in the query parameters.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

items.description: The subscription definition used to create the subscription.

offerType.description: The offer type of the subscription. For example, MS-AZR-0017P (EnterpriseAgreement) and MS-AZR-0148P (EnterpriseAgreement devTest) are available.

subscriptionDisplayName.description: The display name of the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

parameters.description: The name of the Azure subscription definition.
parameters.name: subscriptionDefinitionName

parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2015-06-01
parameters.name: api-version

200.description: Normal response for a successful query. The response body will contain the data that matches the filters specified in the query parameters.

schema.description: The subscription definition used to create the subscription.

offerType.description: The offer type of the subscription. For example, MS-AZR-0017P (EnterpriseAgreement) and MS-AZR-0148P (EnterpriseAgreement devTest) are available.

subscriptionDisplayName.description: The display name of the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

parameters.description: The name of the Azure subscription definition.
parameters.name: subscriptionDefinitionName

parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2015-06-01
parameters.name: api-version

200.description: Normal response for a successful query. The response body will contain the data that matches the filters specified in the query parameters.

schema.description: The subscription definition used to create the subscription.

offerType.description: The offer type of the subscription. For example, MS-AZR-0017P (EnterpriseAgreement) and MS-AZR-0148P (EnterpriseAgreement devTest) are available.

subscriptionDisplayName.description: The display name of the subscription.

202.description: Accepted. Subscription creation is in progress.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

offerType.description: The offer type of the subscription. For example, MS-AZR-0017P (EnterpriseAgreement) and MS-AZR-0148P (EnterpriseAgreement devTest) are available.

subscriptionDisplayName.description: The display name of the subscription.

get.description: Retrieves the status of the subscription definition PUT operation. The URI of this API is returned in the Location field of the response header.

parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2015-06-01
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: The operation ID, which can be found from the Location field in the generate recommendation response header.
parameters.name: operationId

200.description: Successful completion of the asynchronous operation

schema.description: The subscription definition used to create the subscription.

offerType.description: The offer type of the subscription. For example, MS-AZR-0017P (EnterpriseAgreement) and MS-AZR-0148P (EnterpriseAgreement devTest) are available.

subscriptionDisplayName.description: The display name of the subscription.

202.description: Accepted. Subscription update is in progress.

Location.description: The URL where the status of the asynchronous operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

ErrorResponse.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Profile, endpoint, etc.
